hubris:MonsterHypnotic.NAME: Hypnotic
DESCRIPTION: #yEvoke: Apply Befuddled. NL NL #yBefuddled: The first card drawn each turn is transformed.

hubris:MonsterDraining.NAME: Draining
DESCRIPTION: #yDazed to your draw pile. NL Draining is unaffected by #yFocus.

hubris:MonsterWarp.NAME: Warp
DESCRIPTION: #yEvoke: Calls forth another monster from the spire.
